title: Success!
desc: You have successfully accepted a booking request. The person who requested this booking has been notified about your decision and has received an access to your full address. You can message them using your Incoming Bookings dashboard. Questions? Check out our <1>FAQ</1>.
event-info: You have approved a stay for {{count}} cat requested by {{nickname}}.
event-info_plural: You have approved a stay for {{count}} cats requested by {{nickname}}.
